attributes.review: I thought everyone was lying about the flashing and all the glitches but I definitely should have listened I opened the app and saw my orange president and I was on the app for 3.3 seconds before the biggest glitch iv ever seen happend I left the app and my homepage was still flashing and I got scared and it wouldn’t stop had to go to t mobile 😡😡😡 now I hate Cheeto puff pres I can’t believe He thinks ooompa limps orange is cute but he looks like a compressed piece of a gum drop
attributes.title: MY PHONE BROKE

attributes.review: I was trying to find an app to support our wonderful president Donald J Trump, but then once I opened the app, it brought flashing lights to an orange man, I then passed out and started to have hallucinations of the disgusting orange ogre and it haunts me to this day, since then I’ve been lucid dreaming and I can’t handle my fright of being closer than 12 feet towards him, I wonder what Barron goes through, anyways I am getting a therapist for my mental health, adios.
attributes.title: App gives hallucinations and nightmares

attributes.review: When I downloaded the app my phone exploded, causing my house to catch fire, I escaped but my family didn’t, I was forced to live on the streets eating what scraps were thrown at me. I was fighting for food with a rat when I was bitten and I was rushed to the hospital and treated for rabies. But I didn’t have any money so I was thrown out and had to hitch hike a ride, I was riding with a trucker and he kidnapped me and took me back to his house where he forced me to watch rom cons. I died.
attributes.title: Sad truth

attributes.review: Do t get me wrong I love Trump as a president but he’s taking down Tik Tok in USA?! I mean come on Tik Tok helped me and so many other people get through quarantine. And now he’s taking it down?! I’m sry but Tik Tok is just a social media. Trump is a amazing president but taking down Tik Tok is not a good move.
attributes.title: I love Trump but what he did I’m not a fan of

attributes.review: This app was extremely slow!! It was also very difficult to navigate!! Would not recommend, it’s not even worth your time to download the app!! It took the app two hours to be fully downloaded. Then, it wouldn’t even load (has nothing to do with my WiFi). I had downloaded an app previous to this and it took five minutes tops. Poor quality!!
attributes.title: Not worth your time!!

attributes.review: I downloaded the app just to try and understand more about Trump. But as soon as i opened the app, my phone started glitching and my phone shut it self off. I got scared and legitimately thought my phone was never going to turn on again but luckily it did after an hour of messing with it. However, my phone is still very glitchy! Anyway the point is, don’t download this app!!
attributes.title: Do Not Download!

attributes.review: If y’all want this orange Cheeto puff as president than you must be really dumb or just want the republicans to stay in power. I did review the app and it crashed my phone and I had to wait a few hours to get back on the app. I had literally delete some apps including this one to make sure it works. Too many bugs and overall just a bad app. If you want to make an app at least make it a good one.
attributes.title: Terrible App

attributes.review: The news is completely narrow minded, all supported him, he does some bad things and we should have a right to know just because he is our president does not make him the good guy the app has more bugs then I can count, this boy takes and takes and will be worse the Clinton, he is a racist, homophobe, and all around disgrace I’d rather live anywhere else than America, oh btw this is all for the vine 😘✌🏼
attributes.title: Horrible app in general

attributes.review: The app took a whole month to download and when I opened it, it was trumps nudes🤮 it had asked for my number so I put it in and my phone got hacked and now almost all my pictures and apps are gone. It also glitches when you try to do anything. There’s also a section dedicated to the court files of trump sexually assaulting a minor so now I hate trump more then anything, anyway bad app don’t get it🤢😤😤😤
attributes.title: Awful app 🤮🤮🤢

attributes.review: i wanted to download the app to support our amazing president 😋🍊🍊🍊 but it took 7 HOURS to download 😣 not only that but when it downloaded i was outside near my pool and my phone started beeping and scared me and i dropped my phone inside the pool where my dolphin was 😭😭🤯😢 my dolphin started screaming and was saying the app was scaring her saying she would die 💔 then it started stinking like skunk and then rats jumped in the pool and killed my dolphin 😖😖😖😖 NEVER DOWNLOAD THIS APP !!!!  rip rosa 🥺❤️💗💞💘💖🐬🐬🐬🐬
attributes.title: IT KILLED MY PET DOLPHIN
